abstract: Citigroup agreed to buy Egg Banking, a British online bank, for $1.13 billion, the latest in a series of small deals to expand its retail presence abroad.
snippet: Citigroup agreed to buy Egg Banking, a British online bank, for $1.13 billion, the latest in a series of small deals to expand its retail presence abroad.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup agreed yesterday to buy Egg Banking, a British online bank owned by Prudential P.L.C., for $1.13 billion, the latest in a series of small deals to expand its retail presence abroad.

headline.main: Citigroup to Buy Online Bank in Britain to Expand Retail Presence
headline.print_headline: Citigroup to Expand in Britain by Buying Online Bank for $1.1 Billion
